messages.message:
Hey, I find that the UI for exposing classification confidence is very hidden. Most users don't know there is a confidence for this, or struggle to find it in my experience.

The main issues with it are:
1. Confidence value is hidden in an unintuitive place (behind the 3 dots)
    a. It makes more sense to me to surface it at the top level next to the assigned class in the same pane where we add fields
2. You can only see confidence of 'Other' docs if you go via the 3 dots in another class
    a. This is because there are no 3 dots for the other class
CC: @Paul H can you coordinate with the appropriate partner in design to communicate this feedback?
Agreed that this would be a good product workflow to reevaluate its ease of discovery

We actually have data around this being a flow that feels a little confusing and we had a design item around this as well.

cc: @alagu I know that we have a design item here as well that we never really got time to prioritize. I'd recommend this as an office hours task for a short term fix. cc: @Natasha
@alagu @Natasha feel free to loop me in when the designs are finalized/need engineering input
